title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 2 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 2 2021
description:
Vivek Ramaswamy, entrepreneur and author of NYT Bestselling book, Woke, Inc.: Inside Corporate America’s Social Justice Scam, joins Clay and Buck to talk woke madness. Wokeness gives countries like China legitimacy. How can Americans fight back against the woke onslaught? Less than half of Afghan translators were evacuated. Psaki refuses to discuss leaked Biden call with President Ghani that shows he knew Afghan army was collapsing. MSNBC calls Texas heartbeat bill "forced birth" and compares it to TV show The Handmaid's Tale. Biden ties rainstorms to his Green New Deal spending bill.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
